5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘This day is an ‘Eid (festival) which Allah has ordained for the Muslims. Whoever comes to Friday (prayer), let him take a bath and if he has perfume then let him put some on. And upon you (I urge to use) is the tooth stick.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الزِّينَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about adornment on Fridays
